alert.note: Alert for Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 22 at 11:25AM MDT until May 23 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... East Fork Big Wood River at Gimlet affecting Sun Valley Region and Wood River Foothills zones. .Warm temperatures may melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 East Fork Big Wood River Gimlet 7.9 7.7 Mon 10 am MD MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ073-075-231930- /O.EXT.KPIH.FL.A.0005.000000T0000Z-230523T2200Z/ /EFGI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.OO/ 1125 AM MDT Mon May 22 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...East Fork Big Wood River at Gimlet. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.9 feet, Minor flooding from around the Triumph area downriver to the confluence of the Big Wood River. East Fork Road near Triumph may have water flowing over it. Areas around Hyndman View Drive may have water flowing over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM MDT Monday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.9 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

area.areaDesc: Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
